description: An ontology to represent medically relevant actions, procedures, therapies, interventions, and recommendations.
name: Medical Action Ontology

resources.description: The Ontology Lookup Service (OLS) is a repository for biomedical ontologies that aims to provide a single point of access to the latest ontology versions. You can browse the ontologies through the website as well as programmatically via the OLS API. OLS is developed and maintained by the Samples, Phenotypes and Ontologies Team (SPOT)  at EMBL-EBI.

institution.description: The Monarch Initiative is an integrative data and analytic platform connecting phenotypes to genotypes across species, bridging basic and applied research with semantics-based analysis. We have created or currently contribute to many essential bio-ontologies that together enable sophisticated and semantically integrated computational analysis across gene, genotype, variant, disease, and phenotype data.
institution.name: Monarch Initiative

resources.name: MAXO via OLS
